001package nbody;
002
003import edu.princeton.cs.StdDraw;
004import java.awt.Color;
005import java.io.*;
006import javax.sound.sampled.*;
007
008/**
009 * ****************************************************************************
010 * This class determines the position, velocity, mass, and other aspects of the
011 * planets in the simulation.
012 *
013 *
014 *****************************************************************************
015 */
016public class Body {
017
018    private Vector r;      // position
019    private Vector v;      // velocity
020    private final double mass;   // mass
021
022    public Body(Vector r, Vector v, double mass) {
023        this.r = r;
024        this.v = v;
025        this.mass = mass;
026    } // Body( Vector, Vector, double )
027
028
029    public void bounce(double scale) {
030        double xpos = r.cartesian(0);
031        double ypos = r.cartesian(1);
032        if (xpos >= scale) {
033            v.xswitch();
034        }
035        if (ypos >= scale) {
036            v.yswitch();
037        }
038        if (xpos <= -scale) {
039            v.xswitch();
040        }
041        if (ypos <= -scale) {
042            v.yswitch();
043        }
044    }
045
046    public void move(Vector f, double dt) {
047        Vector a = f.times(1 / mass);
048        v = v.plus(a.times(dt));
049        r = r.plus(v.times(dt));
050    } // move( Vector, double )
051
052    public Vector forceFrom(Body b) {
053        Body a = this;
054        double G = 6.67e-11;
055        Vector delta = b.r.minus(a.r);
056        double dist = delta.magnitude();
057        double F = (G * a.mass * b.mass) / (dist * dist);
058        return delta.direction().times(F);
059    } // forceFrom( Body )
060
061    public void draw() {
062        StdDraw.setPenRadius(mass / 6.0e29);
063        StdDraw.setPenColor(Color.RED);
064        StdDraw.point(r.cartesian(0), r.cartesian(1));
065    } // draw()
066
067    // this method is only needed if you want to change the size of the bodies
068    public void draw(double penRadius) {
069        StdDraw.setPenRadius(penRadius);
070        StdDraw.point(r.cartesian(0), r.cartesian(1));
071    } // draw( double )
072
073} // Body
